info.title: Document AI API
info.description: Use next-generation AI to extract data, fields, insights and text from documents. Instantly.

post.summary: Enforce Policies to a Document to allow or block it using Advanced AI
post.description: Enforce Policies to a Document to allow or block it using Advanced AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Input request, including document and policy rules

post.summary: Extract Text from a Document using AI
post.description: Extract raw text from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.  Supports a wide range of languages.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract Field Values from a Document using AI
post.description: Extract Field Values (e.g. Invoice Number, Invoice Date, Business Card Phone Number, etc.) from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.

parameters.name: FieldNames
parameters.description: Desired fields to extract, comma separated

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract Field Values from a Document using Advanced AI
post.description: Extract Field Values (e.g. Invoice Number, Invoice Date, Business Card Phone Number, etc.) from a document using Advanced AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Input request, including document file as byte array, and information on which fields to extract

post.summary: Extract Tables of Data from a Document using AI
post.description: Extract Tables, comprised of rows and columns of data, from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract Barcodes of from a Document using AI
post.description: Extract all barcodes from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract All Fields and Tables of Data from a Document using AI
post.description: Extract all Fields and Tables, comprised of rows and columns of data, from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract Classification or Category from a Document using AI
post.description: Extract Classification or Category (e.g. Invoice, Receipt, Tax Form, or Form 1040, Form 1040 EZ, etc.) from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.

parameters.name: Categories
parameters.description: Desired classification to extract

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract Classification or Category from a Document using Advanced AI
post.description: Extract Classification or Category (e.g. Invoice, Receipt, Tax Form, or Form 1040, Form 1040 EZ, etc.) from a document using Advanced AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Input request to perform the classification on

post.summary: Extract Summary from a Document using AI
post.description: Creates a 1 paragraph summary of the input document using Artificial Intelligence.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract Text from a Document using AI as a Batch Job
post.description: Creates an async batch job for processing a large document as an AI batch job.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.  Supports a wide range of languages.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract Field Values from a Document using Advanced AI as a Batch Job
post.description: Creates an async batch job for processing a large document as an AI batch job.  Extract Field Values (e.g. Invoice Number, Invoice Date, Business Card Phone Number, etc.) from a document using Advanced AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

post.summary: Extract All Fields and Tables of Data from a Document using AI as a Batch Job
post.description: Creates an async batch job for processing a large document as an AI batch job.  Extract all Fields and Tables, comprised of rows and columns of data, from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract Classification or Category from a Document using AI as a Batch Job
post.description: Creates an async batch job for processing a large document as an AI batch job.  Extract Classification or Category (e.g. Invoice, Receipt, Tax Form, or Form 1040, Form 1040 EZ, etc.) from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.

parameters.name: Categories
parameters.description: Desired classification to extract

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

get.summary: Get the status and result of an Extract Document Batch Job
get.description: Returns the result of the Async Job - possible states can be STARTED or COMPLETED.  This API is only available for Cloudmersive Managed Instance and Private Cloud deployments.

AdvancedExtractClassificationRequest.description: Request to perform an AI document classification on a document

InputFile.description: Input document file to perform the operation on as a byte array

MaximumPagesProcessed.description: Optional: Limit the number of pages processed

AdvancedExtractFieldsRequest.description: Request to perform an AI field extraction on a document

InputFile.description: Input document file to perform the operation on as a byte array

FieldsToExtract.description: Fields to extract from the document

MaximumPagesProcessed.description: Optional: Limit the number of pages processed

DocumentAdvancedClassificationResult.description: Result of classifying a document using AI

DocumentCategoryResult.description: Category applied to the document; if a category could not be identified then "other" will be used.  Spaces are replaced with underscores.

CategoryDescription.description: Optional but recommended: Description of the classification in natural langugage

DocumentClassificationResult.description: Result of classifying a document using AI

DocumentCategoryResult.description: Category applied to the document; if a category could not be identified then "other" will be used.  Spaces are replaced with underscores.

InputFile.description: Input file as a byte array

Rules.description: Rules to apply to the document

DocumentPolicyResult.description: Result of performing a document policy enforcement operation

CleanResult.description: True if the document complies with all of the policies, and false if it does not

RiskScore.description: Risk score between 0.0 and 1.0 where values above 0.5 are increasing levels of risk

ExtractBarcodesAiResponse.description: Result of extracting barcodes from a document

BarcodeResults.description: Table value results from the extraction operation

ExtractDocumentBatchJobResult.description: Result of performing a split document batch job

AsyncJobID.description: When creating a job, an Async Job ID is returned.  Use the GetAsyncJobStatus API to check on the status of this job using the AsyncJobID and get the result when it finishes

ExtractDocumentJobStatusResult.description: Result of performing a batch job operation

Successful.description: True if the operation to check the status of the job was successful, false otherwise

AsyncJobStatus.description: Returns the job status of the Async Job, if applicable.  Possible states are STARTED and COMPLETED

ExtractFieldsAndTablesResponse.description: Result of extracting fields from a document

FieldResults.description: Field value results from the extraction operation

TableResults.description: Table value results from the extraction operation

ExtractFieldsResponse.description: Result of extracting fields from a document

Results.description: Field value results from the extraction operation

ExtractTablesResponse.description: Result of extracting tables from a document

TableResults.description: Table value results from the extraction operation

ExtractTextResponse.description: Result of extracting text from a document

PageResults.description: Page results from the extraction operation

BarcodeType.description: Type of the barcode identified, possible values are: AZTEC, CODABAR, CODE_39, CODE_93, CODE_128, DATA_MATRIX, EAN_8, EAN_13, ITF, MAXICODE, PDF_417, QR_CODE, RSS_14, RSS_EXPANDED, UPC_A, UPC_E, All_1D, UPC_EAN_EXTENSION, MSI, PLESSEY, IMB, UNKNOWN

BarcodeValue.description: Value of the barcode as a string

ExtractedTextPage.description: Extracted page from an input document

FieldToExtract.description: Field to extract from a document using AI

FieldName.description: Name of the field to extract

FieldOptional.description: Optional: True if the field is optional, false if required (default)

FieldDescription.description: Optional but recommended: Description of the field - use this to describe what the field is, how it is formatted, what is unique about it, etc.

FieldExample.description: Optional: Example label or value of the field

FieldValue.description: Field value result of extracting fields from a document

FieldName.description: Name of the field (note that spaces will be replaced with underscore)

FieldStringValue.description: String value of the field that was extractged from the document

RuleType.description: Possible values are ALLOW and DENY

RuleDescription.description: Description of the rule in natural language, e.g. Do not allow documents that contain offensive language

PolicyRuleViolation.description: Instances of a policy rule violation

RuleId.description: ID of the rule; if no ID was supplied, the ID is the 1-based index of the rule

RuleViolationRiskScore.description: Risk score between 0.0 and 1.0 where values above 0.5 are increasing levels of risk

RuleViolationRationale.description: AI natural language rationale for why this policy was violated

TableResultCell.description: Cell of a row of a table extracted from a document

TableResultRow.description: Row of a table extracted from a document
